div.h2: Diagnosis_Problem Triggers for Public Health Reporting

div.p: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient may have a potentially reportable condition regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright@copy; 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement. The ICD-10 is copyrighted by the WHO, which owns and publishes the classification. For US Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM / ICD-10-CM)Contact: National Center for Health Statistics (NCHS), Center for Disease Control and Prevention http://www.cdc.gov/nchs/icd/icd10cm.htm#10update http://www.cdc.gov/nchs/icd/icd9.htm http://www.cdc.gov/nchs/icd.htm.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm

name.value: Diagnosis_Problem Triggers for Public Health Reporting
HL7 Public Health and Emergency Response WorkGroup

description.value: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient may have a potentially reportable condition regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright@copy; 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement. The ICD-10 is copyrighted by the WHO, which owns and publishes the classification.
